title: Knowing tRump, he will come up with some dirt or at least a secret weapon of sorts tonight. - Democratic Underground Forums
text: [Create a free account](/?com=login&create=1)Support DU (and get rid of ads!): [Become a Star Member](/star) [Latest Breaking News](/?com=forum&id=1014) [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [The DU Lounge](/?com=forum&id=1018) [All Forums](/?com=forums) [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311) [Culture Forums](/?com=forum&id=1312) [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313) [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) [Support Forums](/?com=forum&id=1315) [Help & Search](/?com=search) Related: [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [Editorials & Other Articles](/?com=forum&id=1016), [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311), [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313), [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) (12,652 posts) Thu Jun 27, 2024, 06:25 PM 28 min ago [FarPoint](/?com=profile&uid=240304) He never thinks rational like we do and most people...we apply logic...tRump is showing up as he has a plan of sorts to execute tonight...say it be a rant of his own making...he really isn't even going to follow the questions...He will attack, Obama, Hunter, the Judges, etc...Jack Smith and avoid the questions... Reports are he declined to prep for a debate....telling me he is going to do his own agenda...he has a platform and is going to use it spewing his bat-shit crazy stuff... chaos is his friend. Be prepared... Heck....another thought.... He may "accidentally" expose our intelligence to the world in the debate. [5 newestHighlight 5 most recent replies](#!) [I hope you are right](#post1)birdographer 24 min ago #1 [But here's the thing...](#post6)moose65 7 min ago #6 [Heh, heh. They don't call The Felon a con for no reason](#post2)BoRaGard 24 min ago #2 [He didn't on 2016 or 2020](#post3)brooklynite 23 min ago #3 [True....](#post4)FarPoint 20 min ago #4 [His mental state is worse now. Even more unpredictable.](#post5)emulatorloo 19 min ago #5 [I'm not sure he can raise an issue that Joe Biden isn't prepared for.](#post7)Jim__ 1 min ago #7 (1,519 posts) [birdographer](/?com=profile&uid=346559) This is an ideal situation. Less ideal is if he acts adult and normal. I'll be so disappointed! Unfortunately I'm not sure how much of a rant or tantrum he can throw in 2-minute increments. Unless he just goes on raving with a dead mic. (3,186 posts) [moose65](/?com=profile&uid=153902) [birdographer (Reply #1)](#post1) Trump thinks he can do no wrong. To him, the way he always acts is adult and normal. He doesnt know how to act any other way. (731 posts) [BoRaGard](/?com=profile&uid=372434) He's true republican, always on the lookout for more "suckers and losers." (95,792 posts) [brooklynite](/?com=profile&uid=112524) (12,652 posts) [FarPoint](/?com=profile&uid=240304) [brooklynite (Reply #3)](#post3) but today...he knows he can't discuss in a debate fashion about current events with Biden as he feels the loss from 2020...he knows in his gut he fails So, a new chaos plan emerges... I'm trying to think outside the box ...that's where his slime nest rests. (44,513 posts) [emulatorloo](/?com=profile&uid=132407) [brooklynite (Reply #3)](#post3) (14,187 posts) [Jim__](/?com=profile&uid=122781) Trump tends to make the same accusations over and over and over again. I'm not sure he can come up with any real surprises.
